text: @BillGates GOOD DAY, SIR, I AM REALLY SUFFERING AND DYING OF HUNGER IN THIS CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. I NEED YOUR FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, ACCOUNT NUMBER NAME: ADEKANYE ADETOLA EMMANUEL. BANK NAME: UNION BANK OF NIGERIA PLC. DOLLAR DOMICILIARY ACCOUNT NUMBER: 0056529387.
